structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Accepting Of Gifts, Grants Or Contributions; Contracts
law.text: Said committee may accept gifts, grants or contributions from any source, whether public or private, and may enter into contracts to provide or receive services with any federal, state, county or municipal entity, with any group or individual, whether profit or nonprofit, or with any nonprofit or voluntary charitable group, corporation, association or organization, including any bar association or bar advocate group.
